casebody.data:
Re: XPO LOGISTICS, INC.
v.
ANIS 395A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 16, 2016

Mr. Brian D. Boone, Mr. Mark T. Calloway, Mr. Michael Hoernlein, Charlotte, Attorneys at Law, For Anis, Fouzi.

Mr. David C. Wright, III, Mr. Douglas M. Jarrell, Charlotte, Attorneys at Law, For XPO Logistics, Inc.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 15th of November 2016 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of November 2016."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 13th day of January 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
